name: What A Disaster!
description:
What A Disaster is a fast pace action game where you control a small robot and try to defend an island from natural disasters for as long as you can with different tools.

  • Fire Hose - To put out Fires and fiery Tornadoes
  • Vacuum - To suck em damn Tornadoes
  • Pickaxe - To destroy Volcanoes and Toxic Geysers
